patch 8.2.0385: menu functionality insufficiently tested

Problem:    Menu functionality insufficiently tested.
Solution:   Add tests.  Add menu_info(). (Yegappan Lakshmanan, closes #5760)

patch 8.2.0386: part from unfinished patch got included

Problem:    Part from unfinished patch got included.
Solution:   Undo that part.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/bb65a5690c24ccfce37e210316bf1d0964c91359|patch 8.2.0387: error for possible NULL argument to qsort()>
patch 8.2.0387: error for possible NULL argument to qsort()

Problem:    Error for possible NULL argument to qsort().
Solution:   Don't call qsort() when there is nothing to sort. (Dominique
            Pelle, closes #5780)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0387: error for possible NULL argument to qsort() · vim/vim@bb65a56
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0387: error for possible NULL argument to qsort() · vim/vim@bb65a56
attachments.text: Problem: Error for possible NULL argument to qsort(). Solution: Don't call qsort() when there is nothing to sort. (Dominique Pelle, closes #5780)

patch 8.2.0388: printmbcharset option not tested

            Pelle, closes #5783)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/e4fc746d13f5b6a0b5c3a8efdff7de1454c3297d|patch 8.2.0389: delayed redraw when shifting text from Insert mode>
patch 8.2.0389: delayed redraw when shifting text from Insert mode

Problem:    Delayed redraw when shifting text from Insert mode.
Solution:   Use msg_attr_keep() instead of msg(). (closes #5782)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0389: delayed redraw when shifting text from Insert mode · vim/vim@e4fc746
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0389: delayed redraw when shifting text from Insert mode · vim/vim@e4fc746
attachments.text: Problem: Delayed redraw when shifting text from Insert mode. Solution: Use msg_attr_keep() instead of msg(). (closes #5782)

patch 8.2.0390: terminal postponed scrollback test is flaky

Problem:    Terminal postponed scrollback test is flaky.
Solution:   Add delay in between sending keys.  Rename dump files.

attachments.title: patch 8.2.0390: terminal postponed scrollback test is flaky · vim/vim@ddbfe23

patch 8.2.0391: CI test coverage dropped

Problem:    CI test coverage dropped.
Solution:   Set $DISPLAY also for non-GUI builds. (James McCoy, closes #5788)
